item.description:
ATTENTION FASHION FANS: Fashion's Night Out is almost here!

Attend this NO FEE Meetup and get ready Boston!

Join us this Thursday, August 30th 5:30 pm at Mija Faneuil Hall

Michelle McCormack and Rich Villani - producers of Boston's Fashion's Night Out

On Sept 6th, 2012, The City of Boston will host the city's 2nd Fashion’s Night Out. Started in '09 FNO is a collaboration between VOGUE Magazine, CFDA, NYC & CO and the City of New York Description Launched in 2009 as a partnership with VOGUE magazine and the Council of Fashion Designers of America, Fashion’s Night Out has become a global celebration.

Michelle and Rich were selected by Vogue to lead Boston's celebration of fashion, performance, and stylish fun. Michelle and Rich look forward to sharing with you all the FNO events, the best strategies for enjoying all that is going on, as well as taking your questions. Start the "fashion season" off right!

All Boston Fashion Meetups are networking events

Don't forget your business cards

www.facebook.com/FashionBoston

SOCIAL MEDIA by LoveTheCool
http://VillaniProductions.net/
http://LoveTheCool.net/
item.name: LEARN ABOUT BOSTON'S FASHION NIGHT OUT w/ Michelle McCormack & Rich Villani
